newsitem.title: USA: BEFORE THE BELL - PETsMART resumes decline.
newsitem.headline: BEFORE THE BELL - PETsMART resumes decline.

text.p: PETsMART Inc shares moved lower in pre-open trade Thursday after the company warned of weak quarterly results, clipping a slight recovery from last Friday's tumble to about $12 from $16.
PETsMART fell 1-7/8 to 9-3/4 in early third market activity, traders said.
The pet-supplies retailer said it expects to post fiscal first quarter operating earnings of $0.05 per share, below the consensus Wall Street view of $0.08, citing soft sales trends.
The company earned $0.06 per share in the year-ago first quarter.
Novellus Systems Inc shares slipped to 77 from 78-1/2 after it announced the acquisition of the thin film systems business of Varian Associates Inc for $150 million.
Varian made no moves ahead of the regular-session open.
